name: Street Magic
description:
Try your hand as a street magician!
Made for RMIT Game-a-Week 2022

Controls
--------------------------
Move Cursor With Mouse
Left Click To Interact
--------------------------

Externally Sourced Assets

Main Theme:
Take Me Down To The Fashion Show - NoMBe, YouTube Audio Library

Sound Effects:
Polite Applause - Sound Mods SOUNDFX
Applause - Khoa
Loud Crowd Applause - ParadoxMirror
Stock Magic Sound Effects
Audience 'Boo'
